products.title: Major Tomcat Travel Mug
products.body_html:
This 12 oz travel mug is giving David Bowie. It's giving cosmonaut kitty cat consciousness. It's giving universal mother. One sip and you'll be transported!

A vessel uniquely worthy of the coffee inside, Carter Move Mugs by Fellow are designed to maximize heat retention and amplify the senses. With a snap-in splash guard and slim width, you can enjoy coffee at its fullest on-the-go.

PRODUCT FEATURES

  • 18/8 stainless steel, BPA-free plastic lid, inner ceramic coating
  • Fits most standard drippers
  • Fits most car cup holders
  • Dishwasher safe

Shipments typically go out within 48 hours. 

Free pickup in South Austin available Mon-Fri, 10am-5pm - select "local pickup" under delivery during checkout.

products.title: Hello Darkness Winter Blend
products.body_html:
We taste notes of dark chocolate, baking spices, and fruitcake

These are dark days, and not just because of the winter solstice. But people like us - we're not afraid of the dark. 

This seasonal blend is giving major cozy winter vibes. Fairly dark with decent body, yet still sweet with fruity undertones, it pairs perfectly with chilly days, long nights, and snuggly moments by the fire. Rich and comforting, this coffee is made for those who savor winter's magic yet know that the lighter days will come again soon.

$2 from every bag sold will be donated to The Lilith Fund, which provides direct financial & emotional support to Texans forced to travel to access abortions, & those who need reproductive care close to home.

  • Roast level: Medium-Dark
  • Origin: Colombia
  • Regions: Huila and Tolima
  • Producers: Smallholder women farmers from two different regions in Colombia
  • Altitude: 1600-2000 meters
  • Variety: Bourbon, caturra, colombia, and castillo
  • Process: washed and anaerobic

Your coffee will be roasted fresh to order. Shipments typically go out within 48 hours.

Free pickup in South Austin available Mon-Fri, 10am-5pm - select "local pickup" under delivery during checkout.

Mustard gold poly/cotton blend beanie with a woven fuscia patch.

products.title: Mazateca Mujeres - Mexico
products.body_html:
We taste notes of dark cherry, fig newton, and cinnamon, with an undercurrent of sweet molasses

The Sierra Mazateca range of Oaxaca is home to some of the most vibrant coffees in Mexico. Coffee farms in the area commonly consist of small plots of land that are managed as a family effort, with a male head-of-household typically receiving all the credit (and payment). This community lot challenges that norm, with a superb cup quality that shines a spotlight on women doing great work. We're loving the subtle fruit tones + sweet, medium-bodied approachability of this coffee, and we're betting you will too. 

  • Roast level: Light-medium
  • Origin: Mexico
  • Region: Sierra Mazateca, Oaxaca
  • Producers: a group of women farmers from Eloxochitlán de Flores Magón, San Mateo Yoloxochitlán & Huautla de Jiménez
  • Altitude: 1500-1800 meters
  • Variety: Typica, Bourbon, Mundo Novo
  • Process: Washed

Your coffee will be roasted fresh to order. Shipments typically go out within 48 hours.

Free pickup in South Austin available Mon-Fri, 10am-5pm - select "local pickup" under delivery during checkout.

products.title: Space Cowboy - Ethiopia
products.body_html:
We taste juicy-sweet notes of blueberry jam, grape Capri Sun, and rosé wine

Space Cowboy is a gorgeously fruit-forward natural-process Ethiopian. This Major Tom(cat) is a bit surprising, kinda different, and totally eye-opening. We like to think of it at the David Bowie of coffees. 

Sourced from the Yirgacheffe region of Ethiopia, this coffee was grown by Mrs. Tigest Wako. Mrs. Tigest is a member of the Cafe Imports/Lulo Small Farmers Project, which helps ensure transparency and allows producers more control over pricing and contracts. Her farm is planted with heirloom Ethiopian varieties. During harvest season, ripe cherries are carefully hand picked, sorted, and then placed on raised beds where they are turned and dried in the sun. This style of processing (called “natural”) generally yields a complex and choco-fruity cup. We love it when we find naturals like this one - sweet, balanced, and not overly zingy.

  • Roast level: Medium
  • Origin: Ethiopia
  • Region: Idedo, Yirgacheffe
  • Producer: Mrs. Tigest Wako
  • Altitude: 1900-2400 meters
  • Variety: Heirloom
  • Process: Natural

Your coffee will be roasted fresh to order. Shipments typically go out within 48 hours.

Free pickup in South Austin available Mon-Fri, 10am-5pm - select "local pickup" under delivery during checkout.

products.title: Sunshine Daydream - Ethiopia
products.body_html:
We taste notes of lemon custard, raspberry, and silky honey

You know those people that can get along with anyone? Light, bright, and effortlessly lovable, they can walk into any situation and fit right in? This is the caffeinated beverage version of those people. We love it on pour-over where all its delicate sweetness shines though , but no matter how you serve it, this coffee's a dream come true.

At Dumerso washing station, owners (and sisters) Hirut and Mahder Berhanu carefully oversee the quality-focused processing that ensures their lots feature the sought-after characteristics of the Yirgacheffe region. During the harvest season Hirut employs 290+ workers, 95% of whom are women.

  • Roast level: Light
  • Origin: Ethiopia 
  • Region: Yirgacheffe
  • Producers: Hirut and Mahder Berhanu, Dumerso washing station
  • Altitude: 1960+ meters
  • Variety: Heirloom
  • Process: washed
  • Certified organic 

Your coffee will be roasted fresh to order. Shipments typically go out within 48 hours.

Free pickup in South Austin available Mon-Fri, 10am-5pm - select "local pickup" under delivery during checkout.

products.title: Hario Skerton PRO Hand Grinder
products.body_html:
A burr grinder is one of the best upgrades you can make to your home brew game. Burrs provide a more consistent grind, which leads to more even extraction. The result: consistently delicious brews. 

The Skerton is a favorite amongst coffee newbs and professionals alike. With a 100-gram capacity, it's larger than the Mini-Slim+, but still compact enough for travel. The Skerton PRO has a number of upgraded features that make it even easier to adjust settings and grind consistently. The conical ceramic burrs transfer less heat and shave coffee beans (versus cracking them like blade grinders). Long story short: the Skerton PRO provides a  beautifully consistent grind, leading you to brewtopia. 

Shipments typically go out within 48 hours. 

Free pickup in South Austin available Mon-Fri, 10am-5pm - select "local pickup" under delivery during checkout.

products.title: Killer Queen Darkest Roast
products.body_html:
We taste notes of bakers chocolate and roasted pecan with a rich, robust roastiness

This girl isn't here to play. She's got a dark heart, and she's about to slay your morning routine. Killer Queen is the deepest, darkest, boldest coffee on the Sightseer roster. Bow down to the crown, baby.

The Soppexcca cooperative has transformed itself through transparent operations and gender equality initiatives. Today, their Las Hermanas coffee, produced by over 220 women, is renowned for its quality, empowering the cooperative's members economically and environmentally.

  • Roast level: Daaaaaarrrrrkkkk
  • Origin: Nicaragua
  • Region: Jinotega
  • Producers: Las Hermanas, Soppexcca Cooperative
  • Altitude: 1100-1300 meters
  • Varieties: Caturra, Catuai, Catimor
  • Process: washed
  • Certifications:  Fairtrade, Organic, and Regenerative Organic

Your coffee will be roasted fresh to order. Shipments typically go out within 48 hours.

Free pickup in South Austin available Mon-Fri, 10am-5pm - select "local pickup" under delivery during checkout.

products.title: Hario Mini-Slim+ Hand Grinder
products.body_html:
A burr grinder is one of the best upgrades you can make to your home brew game. Burrs provide a more consistent grind, which leads to more even extraction. The result: consistently delicious brews. 

The Hario Mini-Slim+ is a great hand grinder for beginners and pros alike. This compact lil' guy has a capacity of 24 grams and is perfect for home and/or travel. The conical ceramic burrs transfer less heat and shave coffee beans (versus cracking them like blade grinders). The Mini-Slim+ provides a  beautifully consistent grind that can easily be adjusted and set for repeat use.

Shipments typically go out within 48 hours. 

Free pickup in South Austin available Mon-Fri, 10am-5pm - select "local pickup" under delivery during checkout.

products.title: El Prisma Pride Blend
products.body_html:
We taste notes of silky chocolate, blueberry syrup, and the warm feeling that comes from knowing that you are loved and supported.

Grounded by chocolatey tones and rounded off with fruity high notes, this is a beautifully-balanced joy of a blend. No matter the brew method, this bb tastes fabulous. We recommend drinking it with a banned book, at a drag brunch, or while testifying before the Texas Legislature.

We love Pride so much, we want to celebrate it beyond June. So we’re making this coffee available all year round! Every bag purchased = a $3 donation to Out Youth, a central Texas 501(c)(3) organization that promotes the well-being of LGBTQIA+ youth so that they can openly and safely explore and affirm their identities.

  • Roast level: Medium
  • Origins: Guatemala and Ethiopia
  • Regions: Huehuetenango and Yirgacheffe
  • Producers: See our Partners at Origin page
  • Altitude: 1600-2040 meters
  • Processes: Washed and natural

Your coffee will be roasted fresh to order. Shipments typically go out within 48 hours.

Free pickup in South Austin available Mon-Fri, 10am-5pm - select "local pickup" under delivery during checkout.

products.body_html:
You know that friend you have who loves kittens, cookies, and smashing the patriarchy? Man, would they like Sightseer Coffee. A digital gift card is super easy - a few clicks and it goes zooming off to their email inbox, forever cementing you as a truly awesome gifter.

NOTE - Sightseer digital gift cards are good for online purchases on sightseercoffee.co only!

products.title: Dad Bod Medium Roast Blend
products.body_html:
Comforting like a warm hug. We taste notes of chocolate, toffee, cinnamon, and plum.

This coffee's got some added heft, but hey—we love that about him. Deeply sweet and pleasant, we especially dig this dude on immersion methods (think French press and Aeropress) that allow lots of chewy, chocolatey body to develop.

  • Roast level: Medium
  • Origins: Nicaragua & Ethiopia
  • Regions: Jinotega & Yirgacheffe
  • Producers: See our Partners at Origin page
  • Altitude: 1600-2200 meters
  • Process: washed

Your coffee will be roasted fresh to order. Shipments typically go out within 48 hours.

Free pickup in South Austin available Mon-Fri, 10am-5pm - select "local pickup" under delivery during checkout.

products.title: Bat Country - Ethiopia
products.body_html:
We taste notes of dark chocolate, clove, and cinnamon, with a velvety floral finish

This coffee reminds us of Austin: dark and velvety like a late summer evening on the Congress Street bridge, and just as unexpectedly sweet as seeing all those little bat pups learn to fly. 
It's a bit unusual to take a gorgeous Ethiopian Yirgacheffe and roast it on the dark side, but we like things a bit unusual. We're kinda in love with the gothic vibes this coffee is giving us, while maintaining its inherent Ethiopian sweetness and delicacy. After all, "This is Bat Country, and you can definitely stop here." (- Not Hunter S. Thompson)

  • Roast level: Medium-Dark
  • Origin: Ethiopia
  • Region: Yirgacheffe
  • Producers: Hirut and Mahder Berhanu, Dumerso washing station
  • Altitude: 1960+ meters
  • Variety: Heirloom
  • Process: washed
  • Certified organic

Your coffee will be roasted fresh to order. Shipments typically go out within 48 hours.

Free pickup in South Austin available Mon-Fri, 10am-5pm - select "local pickup" under delivery during checkout.

Goes down smoooooth. Makes a kickass shot of espresso and works wonderfully in milk based bevvies like lattes. And don't tell your espresso machine, but it brews up real nice too. Hell to the yeah!

  • Producers: See our Partners at Origin page

Your coffee will be roasted fresh to order. Shipments typically go out within 48 hours.

products.title: Sampler Gift Pack
products.body_html:
Not sure what to give? How about a little bit of everything?! Our whole bean sampler packs include:
  • One 4oz bag of Space Cowboy
  • One 4oz bag of Dad Bod 
  • One 4oz bag of Season of the Witch 
  • One 4oz bag of Hellacious espresso OR Eventide decaf 
  • Two Sightseer stickers
  • A personalized note—just type what you want to say into the "add a note to your order" section of your cart

 

They're great for gifting (add a tote to make it extra special!) but we won't tell if you decide to send one to yourself too!

Your coffee will be roasted fresh to order. Shipments typically go out within 48 hours.

 

Free pickup in South Austin available Mon-Fri, 10am-5pm - select "local pickup" under delivery during checkout.

options.name: Pick one: Hellacious espresso or Eventide decaf

products.title: 6-Month Gift Subscription
products.body_html:
Finding the right gift for someone is hard. But hey, you can't go wrong with coffee that just keeps comin'.

Once a month for 6 months, we'll send a different bag of coffee to your giftee. Awesome coffee will arrive at their doorstep, and they'll be reminded of how cool and thoughtful you are. Everybody wins!

We can even include a handwritten note with the first order. Just type it into the "add a message for us" section of your cart. 

A flat rate of $30 ($5 per bag) will be charged at checkout for shipping.

products.title: Eventide Decaf
products.body_html:
We taste notes of dark chocolate, hazelnut, shortbread, and vanilla bean

Love coffee but caffeine does ya dirty? Make Eventide your new sugar boo. The EA "sugarcane" decaffeination process maintains the flavor and sweetness of the bean, meaning your coffee habit can be deliciously jitter-free.

  • Roast level: Medium–Dark 
  • Origin: Colombia 
  • Region: Tolima
  • Producer: Marta Bayter, El Vergel Estates
  • Altitude: 1500 meters
  • Process: washed, EA decaffeination 

Your coffee will be roasted fresh to order. Shipments typically go out within 48 hours.

products.title: Season of the Witch Dark Roast
products.body_html:
We taste notes of fudge, molasses, and bourbon cherry. Syrupy and thicc!

Is every day Halloween when it comes to your coffee? We get it. We worked some witchy magic to get this one tasting roasty and toasty but never burnt or bitter.

We found this lot with the help of our friends at Osito Coffee Importers, who noticed that more and more female producers were delivering coffee to their purchasing point in Suaza under their own names. To bolster the trend and encourage more women to engage in the business aspects of coffee farming, they developed this women-producer community lot from farms in Huila (and to a lesser degree, Cauca). They hope to expand the program, creating more incentives for women to engage more dynamically in the coffee industry. 

  • Roast level: Dark like your secrets
  • Origin: Colombia
  • Region: Huila (with a bit of Cauca mixed in!)
  • Producers: 8 smallholder farmers from Huila and 2 from Cauca
  • Altitude: 1600-2000 meters
  • Variety: Primarily colombia, castillo, and pink bourbon
  • Process: washed

Your coffee will be roasted fresh to order. Shipments typically go out within 48 hours.

Free pickup in South Austin available Mon-Fri, 10am-5pm - select "local pickup" under delivery during checkout.
